name: Living-Real
description: A real estate management application for owners, tenants, and potential tenants.

name: Auto-Tracker
description: Facilitates tracking important, date related auto details. Never miss an inspection, registration or oil change again.

name: Weather Display
description: Display weather forecasts for cities, for the current day and the next five days. Cities are saved in local storage for later review.

name: Stockman
description: Track stocks and Crypto Currencies as the markets fluctuate.  Quickly monitor activity on mobile devices to know when in-depth review on a brokerage site is necessary.

name: Workday
description: A workday planner - plan out important daily tasks on an hourly basis.  Tasks are color coded according to past, present and future time periods.

name: Budget Tracker
description: A web app to track monetary inflow/outflow during travel. This is a progressive web application that can function when off-line, but later upload revised data to web storage when a connection is restored.

name: Note Taker
description: Maintains a note (or To-Do) list.  Notes can be added, deleted, or modified.
